title: Farm house with pond view-No fees
posting_body: ['Rent includes Lawn mowing, spring and fall cleanups, Snow Plowing, water/sewer and trash removal.', 'Use of one garage spot in the barn.', '-4 Bedroom home on 1 acre of land.', '-1 Full, 1 half bath.', '-Newer Kitchen w/walk-in pantry', '-Newer Half Bath & Mud Room', '-Many energy efficient renovations including new windows, insulation & high efficiency Buderus gas boiler.', '-Open floor plan', '-Hardwood throughout', '-Wood burning Fireplace and Gas Fireplace', '-Decorative woodwork, built-ins, window seat, stained glass & lots of charm.', '-Stone patio', '-Professional Landscaping.', '-Views of Warren Pond and Pilot Grove Farm.', '-Laundry hook up on second floor.', '-Full unfinished walk up attic.', 'Amazing amount of storage.', '-Full unfinished basement.', '-The town of Stow has a community beach on Lake Boon, many apple orchards and working farms, great biking community, hiking trails, rail trail in next town, coming soon to Stow.', '-Walking distance to elementary and middle schools & the town center, with library, churches, stores, restaurants and gym.', '-Good commute for many locations.', '495 is 8-10 min away.', '128 25 min, Rt 2 7-8 min.', '-Commuter Train only 3 min drive away in West Acton.', '-Surrounding town, Bolton, Harvard, Acton, Boxborough, Maynard, Sudbury, Concord, Hudson, Marlborough, Lincoln, Carlisle, Lexington.', '-Detached Barn has single tenant living above and use of second garage spot.', '-Pets might be considered depending on size and temperament.', "-please note the front looks a little different the front porch does not exist it's now a smaller deck."]
